p: An additional semi-structured search of the Web of Science database revealed 190 articles with possible discussion of completed national-level climate change and health V&As. Of these 190 articles, 110 underwent abstract review, and 39 received a full-text review for references to national-level studies. The review results supported the WHO data. A review of the United States Agency for International Development (USAID) database revealed a further 3 V&As that have been conducted—in Uganda, Senegal and Mozambique—with the assistance of USAID’s African and Latin American Resilience to Climate Change (ARCC) Program.
